aelioTroopers.title: Aelio Troopers
aelioTroopers.description: This is a Battledia designed to test the combat capabilities of ARKS. Show off your skills and defeat all the enemies.

aelioDevastators.title: Aelio Devastators
aelioDevastators.description: This is a Battledia designed to test the combat capabilities of ARKS. Show off your skills and defeat the Gigantix that appear before you one by one.
